title: How to Draw a Maple Leaf

steps.title: Draw a triangle with a curved base.
steps.content: Draw a triangle with a curved base.

steps.title: On top of the triangle draw zigzag lines that will look like a crown.
steps.content: On top of the triangle draw zigzag lines that will look like a crown.

steps.title: Draw more zigzag lines on the left and right sides of the triangle.
steps.content: Draw more zigzag lines on the left and right sides of the triangle.

steps.title: Draw a long "U" shape at the bottom of the triangle.
steps.content: Draw a long "U" shape at the bottom of the triangle.

steps.title: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Draw a cross.
steps.content: Draw a cross. The lines donâ€™t need to be perfectly straight. Place the horizontal line slightly below the center.

steps.title: Draw two slanted lines connected to the center of the cross.
steps.content: Draw two slanted lines connected to the center of the cross.

steps.title: Draw more slanted lines connected to your previous lines.
steps.content: Draw more slanted lines connected to your previous lines. This will be the veins of your leaf.

steps.title: Outline your leaf with curve and zigzag lines.
steps.content: Outline your leaf with curve and zigzag lines.

steps.title: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Finalize your drawing and erase unnecessary lines.
